radiographic_examinations.findings: Atelectasis at the lung bases, hepatic steatosis without focal hepatic lesions, two nonobstructive stones in the neck of the gallbladder, splenomegaly (spleen measures 14 cm), minimal inflammatory changes in the pancreatic uncinate process and inferior head, minimal intrapancreatic edema, area of peripancreatic fat stranding, fatty replacement of the head of the pancreas, patent splenic vein, main portal vein, SMV, and normal adrenals, spleen, kidneys, large and small bowel. No ascites, and visualized bones appear normal.
